definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation

sentences.english: The world forgives Richard Wagner's unscrupulousness, but it will not forgive mine.
sentences.chinese: 世人原諒瓦格涅的疏狂，可是我他們不會原諒我。

sentences.english: Earthlings forgive nuttiness of Wagner, but they are not going to forgive me.
sentences.chinese: 世人原諒瓦格涅的疏狂，可是他們不會原諒我。

sentences.english: Quantm him he would completely mad sparse in the river before the showing.
sentences.chinese: 他將他的曠達疏狂完全展現在大江面前。

definition: lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
late at night/in the dead of night
your kind offer/your valued advice/delicate interest and charm

the same night/that very night/successive nights
